mil.emp3.api.events

Class LookAtEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.events.Event<LookAtEventEnum,ILookAt>
      • mil.emp3.api.events.LookAtEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvent<LookAtEventEnum,ILookAt>

    public abstract class LookAtEvent
extends Event<LookAtEventEnum,ILookAt>
    This abstract class implements a lookAT event. It is generated when a lookAt is associated with a map and the map's view changes.

        public boolean isAnimate()
